DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate Centurion® Vision System use 45° Balanced Tip result less Cumulative Dissipated Energy ( CDE ) lnfiniti® Vision System use 45° Mini-Flared Kelman ( MFK ) tip cataract extraction surgery via phacoemulsification cataract grade NII- NIV [ Lens opacities classification system II ( LOCSII ) ] .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Centurion® Vision System With Balanced Tip Infiniti® Vision System With Mini Flared Kelman ( MFK ) Tip During Cataract Extraction Surgery Hard Lenses
DOC.criteria: Willing able consent participation ; Willing able attend postoperative examination per protocol schedule ; Cataract least one eye Nuclear Opalescence IIIV ( via LOCSII ) follow posterior chamber intraocular lens ( IOL ) implantation ; Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply .
